text: Santiago is a municipality in the center of the Mexican state of Nuevo León. It is part of the Monterrey metropolitan area and it has an area of about ."Santiago", Enciclopedia de los Municipios de México , there were 37,886 people living in there.Link to tables of population data from Census of 2005 INEGI: Instituto Nacional de Estadística, Geografía e Informática ==References== == Other websites == * Government of Santiago, Official Website Category:Municipality seats in Nuevo León Category:1648 establishments Category:Settlements in Nuevo León Category:17th-century establishments in Mexico
